meanings.definition: A card for sending a message by mail without an envelope.
meanings.sent1: I sent a postcard to my grandma to tell her about my vacation.
meanings.sent2: I collect postcards from different countries as a hobby.
meanings.sent3: The postcard from my friend made me smile with its funny cartoon.
meanings.sent4: Her words on the postcard were a ray of sunshine in my day.
meanings.sent5: The postcard with the beach scene was so vivid, I felt like I was there.

meanings.definition: A photograph or picture printed on card stock for mailing.
meanings.sent1: The postcard of the Eiffel Tower was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: I bought a postcard with a cute puppy to send to my friend.
meanings.sent3: The postcard of the mountain looked so real, I almost wanted to climb it.
meanings.sent4: The postcard of the sunset was like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The postcard with the city skyline was so detailed, it felt like I was there.
